We already do electronic communication with all of our partners and when we got involved in the process with them, we found out yes, you're doing electronic communications.

And they didn't realize how many inefficiencies they actually had in their own process.
That could be remedied by this particular approach.

Go out for bids on there with their partners every quarter, and so if they're changing partners that often, or if they're trying to get the best price points.
They could actually change partners more often than maybe they do.
